resources.string: Last known location - Latitude in WGS coordinates
Last known location - Longitude in WGS coordinates
Last known location - Altitude value (in m). If [hasAltitude] is false, 0.0f is returned
Last known location - Accuracy of the fix (in m). If hasAccuracy() is false, 0.0 is returned
Last known location - UTC time of this location (in ms)
Speed of the device in meters/second. If [hasSpeed] is \'false\', 0.0f is returned.
Heart rate value in BMP. If hasSensorHeartRate() is false, 0.0 is returned.
Cadence value. If hasCadence() is false, 0 is returned.
Speed of the device over ground in meters/second. This speed is defined only when \'speed sensor\' is connected and supply valid values. If [hasSensorSpeed] is \'false\', 0.0f is returned (in m/s).
The num of strides. If hasSensorStrides() is false, 0 is returned.
Temperature value. If hasSensorTemperature() is false, 0.0f is returned.
Current users pace value (min / km). Computed pace is from highly filtered speed, not from real speed included in current my location object.
Vertical speed from last few (around 5) seconds of enabled GPS\n@return vertical speed in m/s
Current (little filtered) slope value. More about slope, for example at http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Slope)\n@return slope in 0.01%
Information if current location is valid GPS location with usable accuracy (GPS has correctly computed "fix" value).
Number of used satellites for GPS fix.
Total number of visible satellites.
Current declination computed from a) current GPS location, or b) last known location Locus app knows.

Current device orientation. Source for value depend on settings in Locus. Also this value will be 0 in case, user do not need orientation for any action.\n@return orientation value (in degrees) or 0 if orientation is not used or known
Angle between GPS shift and current orientation. This values differ from 0 based on current outside conditions\n@return angle (in degrees) or 0 if no shift exists or GPS or sensors are disabled
Current device course. Source for this value is change in coordinates, or directly GPS values.\n@return course value (in degrees) or 0 if course is not known
Roll angle of current device. For more info see http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flight_dynamics\n@return roll angle (in degree) or 0 if not known
Pitch angle of current device. For more info see http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flight_dynamics\n@return pitch angle (in degree) or 0 if not known
Indicate if user is currently touching a map screen. It do not indicate which specific action is doing, only that something is happening.
Flag is guidance is enabled.\n@return `true` if guiding is enabled
Flag if track recording is currently active. It do not info about it\'s state (paused, running), just if it is enabled at all.\n@return `true` if track recording is active
Flag if track recording is currently active or paused. Firstly check if recording is running before testing if is paused.\n@return `true` if track recording is paused
Name of the active recording profile.\n@return profile name
Flag if GPS is currently enabled in Locus.
Flag if some screen with map is currently visible\n@return `true` if map is visible
ID of active running Live tracking.
ID of active visible dashboard.

Current map zoom level. This value should not be precise in case of using custom map projections, anyway it\'s always closest possible value.\n@return integer as a current zoom level (zoom 0 == whole world (1 tile 256x256px))
Returns the approximate distance in meters between Last known location and the map location. Distance is defined using the WGS84 ellipsoid.\n@return the approximate distance in meters
Current rotation value of map screen. This value may be same as current orientation or should be value by user manual rotation\n@return angle (in degrees) as map rotate
Bottom-right coordinate of current map screen\n@return max bottom-right visible location - Longitude in WGS coordinates
Bottom-right coordinate of current map screen\n@return max bottom-right visible location - Latitude in WGS coordinates
Top-left coordinate of current map screen\n@return max top-left visible location - Longitude in WGS coordinates
Top-left coordinate of current map screen\n@return max top-left visible location - Latitude in WGS coordinates
Even if map is visible or not, this define current map center.\n@return current map center - Longitude in WGS coordinates
Even if map is visible or not, this define current map center.\n@return current map center - Latitude in WGS coordinates
Total length of done route (in m).
Total track distance with speed sensor value (in m).
Negative grade (distance)
Positive grade (distance)
Neutral grade (distance) (in m).
Neutral grade (elevation) (in m).
Negative grade (elevation)
Positive grade (elevation)
Minimum altitude on the track (in m).
Maximum altitude on the track (in m).
Track start time (time of first point) (in ms).
Track stop time (time of last point) (in ms).
Total time of route (in ms).
Total track time with speed (in ms).
Maximal speed of this route (in m/s).
Get average speed value for a track including breaks\n@return average speed in m/s
Get average speed value for a track only movement\n@return average speed in m/s
Number of points (useful when points itself are not loaded).
Get average value of cadence.\n@return average cadence value
Maximum cadence value.
Burned energy (in joule).
Average value of heart rate.
Maximum HRM value.
Total number of strides.
Current guiding location - Longitude in WGS coordinates
Current guiding location - Latitude in WGS coordinates
Bearing to target.
Azimuth to target.
Distance to target.
Name of guiding target.
Expected time to target.
Distance from start (in case of guiding along track).
Distance to finish (in case of guiding along track).
ID of current target.
Expected time to finish (in case of guiding along track).
Get current guiding type.
Flag if active track guidance is valid.
Action that happen on current navigation point.
Distance to current navigation point.
Extra information for navigation point.
Location of current navigation point - Longitude in WGS coordinates
Location of current navigation point - Latitude in WGS coordinates
Name of current navigation target point.
Time to current navigation point.
Action that happen on next navigation point.
Distance to next navigation point.
Extra information for navigation point.
Location of next navigation point - Longitude in WGS coordinates
Location of next navigation point - Latitude in WGS coordinates
Name of next navigation target point.
Time to next navigation point.
Distance to the next via-point (or destination in case, no other via points exists).
Name of the next via-point (or destination in case, no other via points exists).
Relative time to the next via-point (or destination in case, no other via points exists).

Remaining uphill elevation based on altitude values of each track point. Accuracy is dependent on the amount and quality of track point altitude values. Only available during Navigation based on an existing track.

Remaining downhill elevation based on altitude values of each track point. Accuracy is dependent on the amount and quality of track point altitude values. Only available during Navigation based on an existing track.
Index of nearest Point of the current navigation track. Only available during Navigation based on an existing track.
Name of Track which is used for Navigation. Only available during Navigation based on an existing track.
